title: Nyang Nyang Beach Escape (Half-day)
overview: Discover a secluded beach with pristine sands, accessed by a scenic jungle descent.

stops.description: Arrive and hike down the jungle path to the beach.
Enjoy a picnic or relax in the natural scenery.

title: Nyang Nyang Adventure (Full-day)
overview: A full day of hiking, beachcombing, and relaxation at Nyang Nyang Beach.

stops.description: Descend to the beach and explore the coastline.
Have lunch and enjoy the peaceful setting.
Take a walk along the cliffs for panoramic views.
